languages.text: Это, определенно, был один из тех кораблей, что спасались от бедствия на планете. Похоже, беглецам, да хранит их души Император, все же не удалось избегнуть судьбы.
This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.
languages.original_text: Это, определенно, был один из тех кораблей, что спасались от бедствия на планете. Похоже, беглецам, да хранит их души Император, все же не удалось избегнуть судьбы.

traits.locale_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.
This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.
This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.
This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

languages.text: Esta nave definitivamente fue una de las que escaparon del cataclismo en el planeta. Parece que los supervivientes, que el Emperador guarde sus almas, no pudieron escapar a su destino.
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: Esta nave definitivamente fue una de las que escaparon del cataclismo en el planeta. Parece que los supervivientes, que el Emperador guarde sus almas, no pudieron escapar a su destino.

languages.text: 这艘飞船当时应该是逃离了那颗行星，试图躲避那场灾难。但看起来，这些试图逃命的幸存者们并没有躲过这一劫，愿帝皇保佑他们的灵魂。
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: 这艘飞船当时应该是逃离了那颗行星，试图躲避那场灾难。但看起来，这些试图逃命的幸存者们并没有躲过这一劫，愿帝皇保佑他们的灵魂。

languages.text: これは確かに、惑星に起きた悲劇を逃れた船のひとつだ。皇帝が彼らの魂を守ってくださるように、生き残った人々は運命を乗り越えることはできなかったようだ。
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: これは確かに、惑星に起きた悲劇を逃れた船のひとつだ。皇帝が彼らの魂を守ってくださるように、生き残った人々は運命を乗り越えることはできなかったようだ。

languages.text: Das war mit Sicherheit eines der Schiffe, die der Katastrophe auf dem Planeten entgangen waren. Doch anscheinend konnten die Überlebenden, der Imperator schütze ihre Seelen, ihrem Schicksal nicht entgehen.
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: Das war mit Sicherheit eines der Schiffe, die der Katastrophe auf dem Planeten entgangen waren. Doch anscheinend konnten die Überlebenden, der Imperator schütze ihre Seelen, ihrem Schicksal nicht entgehen.

languages.text: Il s'agissait certainement de l'un des vaisseaux qui avaient pris la fuite lorsque la calamité avait frappé la planète, mais les survivants, que l'Empereur garde leurs âmes, n'avaient apparemment pas réussi à échapper à leur destin.
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: Il s'agissait certainement de l'un des vaisseaux qui avaient pris la fuite lorsque la calamité avait frappé la planète, mais les survivants, que l'Empereur garde leurs âmes, n'avaient apparemment pas réussi à échapper à leur destin.

languages.text: Bu geminin, gezegendeki felaketten kaçmayı başaran gemilerden biri olduğu gün gibi aşikârdı. Ancak felaketzedeler, karanlık kaderlerinden kaçmayı başaramamışlardı. İmparator ruhlarını korusun.
languages.original_text: This was certainly one of the ships that had escaped the calamity on the planet. It seemed the survivors, may the Emperor guard their souls, could not outrun their fate.

traits.locale_text: Bu geminin, gezegendeki felaketten kaçmayı başaran gemilerden biri olduğu gün gibi aşikârdı. Ancak felaketzedeler, karanlık kaderlerinden kaçmayı başaramamışlardı. İmparator ruhlarını korusun.
